title: Default Quarkus application generated by maven plugin with `narayana-lra` extension doesn't compile
body:
### Describe the bug

Quarkus: 2.13.3

Default Quarkus application generated by maven plugin with `narayana-lra` extension is not working.

Error:
```
ERROR]     [error]: Build step io.quarkus.narayana.lra.deployment.NarayanaLRAProcessor#registerFeature threw an exception: java.lang.IllegalStateException: 'quarkus-narayana-lra' can only work if 'quarkus-resteasy-jackson' or 'quarkus-resteasy-reactive-jackson' is present
```



### Expected behavior

Quarkus application that actually works with all the required dependencies that `narayana-lra` needs. 

### Actual behavior

Quarkus app doesn't compile

### How to Reproduce?

```
mvn io.quarkus.platform:quarkus-maven-plugin:2.13.3.Final:create\
    -DprojectGroupId=org.acme\
    -DprojectArtifactId=config-quickstart\
    -Dextensions='narayana-lra'\
    -DnoCode
```
```
mvn clean install
```
